Docs.summary: Contains classes that allow you to customize the code generated from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks One example of using the code generation feature is the **Add Web Reference** dialog box of Visual Studio. Another example is the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/7h3ystb6(v=vs.100)).
